description: Input to setup the initial state of the battery

initializationSetup.description: Choice of initialization between a given state of charge ("given SOC") or a given input function ("given input"). If this property is not given, the default is a given SOC

initialConcentration.description: Initial Lithium concentration in the electrolyte. This is not used if a given input is given through loadStateCmd. The default value is 1 mol/Liter

initialEthyleneCarbonateConcentration.description: Initial Ethylene Carbonate concentration in the electrolyte. This is used as initial concentration, in case the SEI layer is included in model, see Coating.schema.json and the active_material_type property

loadStateCmd.description: string that when run by matlab eval function return the initial state in the structure initstate
